ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisAppointment of SHARON PERRAULT of Winnipeg, Manitoba, to be a full-time member of the National Parole Board, Prairies Regional Division, to hold office during good behaviour for a period of five years, effective March 24, 2003.
